description: Man Utd transfer rumours: Branthwaite, Maguire, Lookman, Trincao
title: Man Utd transfer rumours: Branthwaite, Maguire, Lookman, Trincao
title_page: Man Utd transfer rumours: Branthwaite, Maguire, Lookman, Trincao - BBC Sport
maintext:
Manchester United will only pursue a summer deal for Everton's Jarrad Branthwaite if Harry Maguire leaves Old Trafford. (Yahoo), external
Atalanta have put an asking price of £50m on 27-year-old forward Ademola Lookman, amid interest from Manchester United and Newcastle United. (Tuttomercato – in Italian), external
Barcelona's buy-back clause with Sporting for winger Francisco Trincao - who has been linked with Manchester United, Arsenal and Newcastle - ended in June 2024. (Record - in Portuguese), external
Want more transfer news? Read Wednesday's full gossip column
